info.name: AI Interviewer API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete API documentation for the AI Interviewer platform backend with working credentials. Includes all endpoints for authentication, domain management, jobs, candidates, resumes, interviews, evaluations, notifications, dashboard, and the new link-based interview access system.

item.name: üîê Authentication

request.description:
Authenticate user and get access token

üìã Working Test Credentials:
‚Ä¢ Company: company_test@example.com / password123
‚Ä¢ Agency: agency_test@example.com / password123
‚Ä¢ Recruiter: recruiter_test@example.com / password123
‚Ä¢ Admin: admin@rslsolution.com / admin123

Register a new user

üìù Note: Username field is optional - will be auto-set to email
Logout user and invalidate token

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user login, registration, and logout

item.name: üë• Candidates Management

request.description: Step 1: Extract data from multiple resumes for preview/editing. Returns extracted data without creating candidates.
Step 2: Submit edited candidate data to create candidates. Use after bulk-extract and frontend editing.

Create multiple candidates from multiple resume files. Upload 1-20 resume files with domain and role selection. Supports direct creation (default) or two-step flow with ?step=extract and ?step=submit query parameters.

üìß **POC Email Support**: The API now supports poc_email field for candidate creation.

üìã **Available Fields**:
‚Ä¢ domain, role, resume_files (required)
‚Ä¢ poc_email (optional - for point of contact email)

‚úÖ **Recent Enhancement**: Added poc_email field support for better candidate management

Retrieve all candidates

üìä **Data Isolation**:
‚Ä¢ Admin users: Can see all candidates
‚Ä¢ Company users: Can see candidates from their company only
‚Ä¢ Hiring Agency users: Can see candidates they created only
‚Ä¢ Recruiter users: Can see candidates they created only

üìß **POC Email**: The response now includes poc_email field for candidates

‚úÖ **Recent Enhancement**: Enhanced data isolation and added poc_email field support

Create a candidate in single step

üìß **POC Email Support**: The API now supports poc_email field for candidate creation.

üìã **Available Fields**:
‚Ä¢ full_name, email, phone, work_experience, domain, resume_file, job (required)
‚Ä¢ poc_email (optional - for point of contact email)

‚úÖ **Recent Enhancement**: Added poc_email field support for better candidate management

item.description: Resume management endpoints including bulk upload functionality

request.description:
Retrieve all interviews

üìã **Features**:
‚Ä¢ Data isolation: Users only see interviews for their candidates
‚Ä¢ Admin users see all interviews
‚Ä¢ Ordered by newest first (-created_at)
‚Ä¢ Includes candidate_name and job_title

üîç **Filtering**:
‚Ä¢ status: Filter by interview status
‚Ä¢ job: Filter by job ID
‚Ä¢ candidate: Filter by candidate ID

üîç **Search**:
‚Ä¢ candidate__full_name: Search by candidate name
‚Ä¢ job__job_title: Search by job title

üîç **Ordering**:
‚Ä¢ created_at: Order by creation date
‚Ä¢ started_at: Order by start time

Schedule a new interview

üìã **Available Parameters** (all optional):
‚Ä¢ candidate: Integer (candidate ID)
‚Ä¢ job: Integer (job ID, nullable)
‚Ä¢ status: String ("scheduled", "completed", "error")
‚Ä¢ interview_round: String (max 100 chars)
‚Ä¢ feedback: Text
‚Ä¢ started_at: DateTime (08:00-22:00 UTC)
‚Ä¢ ended_at: DateTime (08:00-22:00 UTC)
‚Ä¢ video_url: URL (max 500 chars)

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation Rules**:
‚Ä¢ If started_at/ended_at provided, both must be between 08:00-22:00 UTC
‚Ä¢ ended_at must be after started_at
‚Ä¢ Data isolation: Users can only create interviews for their candidates

Get detailed information about a specific interview

üìã **Response Fields**:
‚Ä¢ id: UUID of the interview
‚Ä¢ candidate: Candidate ID
‚Ä¢ candidate_name: Full name of candidate
‚Ä¢ job_title: Title of the job (if job exists)
‚Ä¢ status: Interview status (scheduled/completed/error)
‚Ä¢ interview_round: Round description
‚Ä¢ feedback: Interview feedback
‚Ä¢ started_at: Start time
‚Ä¢ ended_at: End time
‚Ä¢ video_url: Meeting URL
‚Ä¢ created_at: Creation timestamp
‚Ä¢ updated_at: Last update timestamp

‚ö†Ô∏è **Data Isolation**: Users can only access interviews for their candidates

Full update interview information

üìã **Available Parameters** (all optional):
‚Ä¢ candidate: Integer (candidate ID)
‚Ä¢ job: Integer (job ID)
‚Ä¢ status: String ("scheduled", "completed", "error")
‚Ä¢ interview_round: String (max 100 chars)
‚Ä¢ feedback: Text
‚Ä¢ started_at: DateTime (08:00-22:00 UTC)
‚Ä¢ ended_at: DateTime (08:00-22:00 UTC)
‚Ä¢ video_url: URL (max 500 chars)

‚ö†Ô∏è **Notes**:
‚Ä¢ All fields are optional for updates
‚Ä¢ Time validation only applies when updating time fields
‚Ä¢ Data isolation enforced

Partial update interview information

üìã **Available Parameters** (all optional):
‚Ä¢ candidate: Integer (candidate ID)
‚Ä¢ job: Integer (job ID)
‚Ä¢ status: String ("scheduled", "completed", "error")
‚Ä¢ interview_round: String (max 100 chars)
‚Ä¢ feedback: Text
‚Ä¢ started_at: DateTime (08:00-22:00 UTC)
‚Ä¢ ended_at: DateTime (08:00-22:00 UTC)
‚Ä¢ video_url: URL (max 500 chars)

‚ö†Ô∏è **Notes**:
‚Ä¢ Only update specified fields
‚Ä¢ Time validation only applies when updating time fields
‚Ä¢ Data isolation enforced

Delete an interview

‚ö†Ô∏è **Data Isolation**: Users can only delete interviews for their candidates

üóëÔ∏è **Response**: 204 No Content on successful deletion

Get interview status summary statistics

üìä **Response**:
‚Ä¢ scheduled: Count of scheduled interviews
‚Ä¢ completed: Count of completed interviews
‚Ä¢ error: Count of interviews with errors

‚ö†Ô∏è **Data Isolation**: Users only see statistics for their candidates

üìà **Example Response**:
{
  "scheduled": 5,
  "completed": 3,
  "error": 1
}

Generate a new secure interview link for the candidate

üîó **Link Generation**:
‚Ä¢ Creates secure HMAC-based link token
‚Ä¢ Sets expiration time (2 hours after interview)
‚Ä¢ Updates interview record with link

üìã **Response**:
‚Ä¢ interview_link: Secure link token
‚Ä¢ interview_url: Full interview URL
‚Ä¢ expires_at: Link expiration timestamp
‚Ä¢ message: Success message

‚ö†Ô∏è **Security**:
‚Ä¢ Link is cryptographically signed
‚Ä¢ Time-based expiration
‚Ä¢ Only valid for scheduled interview time
‚Ä¢ Cannot be accessed before interview window

item.name: üîó Public Interview Access (No Login Required)

request.description:
Get interview details for candidate access (no authentication required)

üîó **Public Access**: No login required - uses secure link validation

üìã **Response**:
‚Ä¢ interview_id: Interview UUID
‚Ä¢ candidate_name: Candidate's full name
‚Ä¢ candidate_email: Candidate's email
‚Ä¢ job_title: Job title
‚Ä¢ company_name: Company name
‚Ä¢ scheduled_date: Formatted date
‚Ä¢ scheduled_time: Formatted time
‚Ä¢ duration_minutes: Interview duration
‚Ä¢ ai_interview_type: Type of AI interview
‚Ä¢ status: Interview status
‚Ä¢ video_url: Meeting URL
‚Ä¢ can_join: Whether candidate can join
‚Ä¢ message: Status message

‚ö†Ô∏è **Security**:
‚Ä¢ Link must be valid and not expired
‚Ä¢ Access only allowed within interview window
‚Ä¢ Time-based validation enforced

Join/start the interview session (no authentication required)

üöÄ **Interview Start**:
‚Ä¢ Validates interview link
‚Ä¢ Checks if interview can be started
‚Ä¢ Records interview start time
‚Ä¢ Returns AI configuration

üìã **Response**:
‚Ä¢ interview_id: Interview UUID
‚Ä¢ candidate_name: Candidate's name
‚Ä¢ ai_interview_type: Type of AI interview
‚Ä¢ started_at: Interview start timestamp
‚Ä¢ status: Interview status
‚Ä¢ message: Success message
‚Ä¢ ai_configuration: AI interview settings

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation**:
‚Ä¢ Link must be valid and not expired
‚Ä¢ Interview must not be completed
‚Ä¢ Must be within scheduled time window
‚Ä¢ Cannot start before scheduled time

item.description: Public interview access endpoints for candidates - no authentication required, uses secure link validation

item.name: ü§ñ AI Interview Slot Management

request.description:
Retrieve all AI interview slots

ü§ñ **AI Interview Types**:
‚Ä¢ technical: Technical skills assessment
‚Ä¢ behavioral: Behavioral and soft skills
‚Ä¢ coding: Programming and problem-solving
‚Ä¢ system_design: System architecture and design
‚Ä¢ case_study: Business case analysis

üìÖ **Filtering**:
‚Ä¢ date: Filter by specific date (YYYY-MM-DD)
‚Ä¢ ai_interview_type: Filter by AI interview type
‚Ä¢ is_available: Filter by availability status

üìä **Response**: List of slots with AI configuration details

Create a new AI interview slot

ü§ñ **AI Interview Types**:
‚Ä¢ technical: Technical skills assessment
‚Ä¢ behavioral: Behavioral and soft skills
‚Ä¢ coding: Programming and problem-solving
‚Ä¢ system_design: System architecture and design
‚Ä¢ case_study: Business case analysis

üìã **Required Fields**:
‚Ä¢ date: Date (YYYY-MM-DD)
‚Ä¢ start_time: Start time (HH:MM:SS)
‚Ä¢ end_time: End time (HH:MM:SS)
‚Ä¢ ai_interview_type: AI interview type
‚Ä¢ ai_configuration: JSON configuration object
‚Ä¢ company: Company ID

üìù **Optional Fields**:
‚Ä¢ job: Job ID
‚Ä¢ max_candidates: Maximum candidates per slot (default: 1)
‚Ä¢ is_available: Availability status (default: true)

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation**:
‚Ä¢ Time must be between 08:00-22:00 UTC
‚Ä¢ End time must be after start time
‚Ä¢ No conflicts with existing slots

Get detailed information about a specific interview slot

üìã **Response Fields**:
‚Ä¢ id: Slot UUID
‚Ä¢ date: Slot date
‚Ä¢ start_time: Start time
‚Ä¢ end_time: End time
‚Ä¢ ai_interview_type: AI interview type
‚Ä¢ ai_configuration: AI configuration details
‚Ä¢ max_candidates: Maximum candidates
‚Ä¢ current_candidates: Current booked candidates
‚Ä¢ is_available: Availability status
‚Ä¢ created_at: Creation timestamp

Update an existing interview slot

üìù **Updatable Fields**:
‚Ä¢ ai_interview_type: AI interview type
‚Ä¢ ai_configuration: AI configuration object
‚Ä¢ max_candidates: Maximum candidates
‚Ä¢ is_available: Availability status

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation**:
‚Ä¢ Cannot update date/time if slot has bookings
‚Ä¢ AI configuration must be valid JSON

Delete an interview slot

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation**:
‚Ä¢ Cannot delete slots with active bookings
‚Ä¢ Admin users can delete any slot
‚Ä¢ Non-admin users can only delete their own slots

Search for available interview slots with advanced filtering

üîç **Request Body Parameters**:
‚Ä¢ start_date: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
‚Ä¢ end_date: End date (YYYY-MM-DD)
‚Ä¢ ai_interview_type: Filter by AI interview type
‚Ä¢ company_id: Filter by company
‚Ä¢ job_id: Filter by job
‚Ä¢ start_time: Filter by start time (HH:MM:SS)
‚Ä¢ end_time: Filter by end time (HH:MM:SS)
‚Ä¢ duration_minutes: Minimum slot duration

üìã **Response**:
‚Ä¢ List of available slots matching criteria
‚Ä¢ Slot details and availability status
‚Ä¢ AI interview type and configuration

‚ö†Ô∏è **Note**: This endpoint uses POST with request body for complex filtering

Book a candidate for an interview slot

üìã **Required Fields**:
‚Ä¢ candidate_id: Candidate ID
‚Ä¢ interview_id: Interview UUID

‚úÖ **Response**:
‚Ä¢ id: Created schedule ID
‚Ä¢ interview: Interview UUID
‚Ä¢ slot: Slot UUID
‚Ä¢ status: Schedule status
‚Ä¢ created_at: Creation timestamp

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation**:
‚Ä¢ Slot must be available
‚Ä¢ Candidate must not have conflicting interviews
‚Ä¢ Slot must not be at capacity

Release a booked interview slot

‚úÖ **Response**:
‚Ä¢ message: Release confirmation
‚Ä¢ slot_available: Updated availability status
‚Ä¢ current_bookings: Current number of bookings
‚Ä¢ max_candidates: Maximum candidates allowed

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation**:
‚Ä¢ Only slot owner or admin can release
‚Ä¢ Cancels any active schedules for the slot
‚Ä¢ Forces slot to available status

Create multiple recurring interview slots

üìÖ **Parameters**:
‚Ä¢ start_date: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
‚Ä¢ end_date: End date (YYYY-MM-DD)
‚Ä¢ start_time: Start time (HH:MM:SS)
‚Ä¢ end_time: End time (HH:MM:SS)
‚Ä¢ ai_interview_type: AI interview type
‚Ä¢ ai_configuration: AI configuration
‚Ä¢ days_of_week: Array of days (1=Monday, 7=Sunday)
‚Ä¢ max_candidates: Maximum candidates per slot
‚Ä¢ company_id: Company ID (required)
‚Ä¢ job_id: Job ID (optional)

‚úÖ **Response**:
‚Ä¢ created_slots: Number of slots created
‚Ä¢ skipped_slots: Array of skipped slots due to conflicts
‚Ä¢ message: Creation summary

‚ö†Ô∏è **Note**: Slots are skipped if there are time conflicts

Search for available interview slots

üîç **Query Parameters**:
‚Ä¢ date: Filter by date (YYYY-MM-DD)
‚Ä¢ ai_interview_type: Filter by AI interview type
‚Ä¢ start_time: Filter by start time (HH:MM:SS)
‚Ä¢ end_time: Filter by end time (HH:MM:SS)

üìä **Response**:
‚Ä¢ available_slots: List of available slots
‚Ä¢ total_count: Total available slots
‚Ä¢ filters_applied: Applied filter criteria

Get interview calendar view

üìÖ **Query Parameters**:
‚Ä¢ year: Year (YYYY)
‚Ä¢ month: Month (1-12)
‚Ä¢ ai_interview_type: Filter by AI interview type

üìä **Response**:
‚Ä¢ calendar_data: Monthly calendar with slot information
‚Ä¢ total_slots: Total slots in month
‚Ä¢ available_slots: Available slots count
‚Ä¢ booked_slots: Booked slots count

Retrieve all interview schedules

üìã **Response**:
‚Ä¢ List of scheduled interviews with slot details
‚Ä¢ Candidate and interview information
‚Ä¢ Meeting links and status

üîç **Filtering**:
‚Ä¢ candidate: Filter by candidate ID
‚Ä¢ interview: Filter by interview ID
‚Ä¢ slot: Filter by slot ID
‚Ä¢ status: Filter by schedule status

Create a new interview schedule

üìã **Required Fields**:
‚Ä¢ interview: Interview UUID
‚Ä¢ slot: Slot UUID

üìù **Optional Fields**:
‚Ä¢ meeting_link: Meeting URL
‚Ä¢ notes: Additional notes

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation**:
‚Ä¢ Interview and slot must exist
‚Ä¢ Slot must be available
‚Ä¢ No conflicts with existing schedules

Get detailed information about a specific schedule

üìã **Response Fields**:
‚Ä¢ id: Schedule UUID
‚Ä¢ interview: Interview details
‚Ä¢ slot: Slot details
‚Ä¢ meeting_link: Meeting URL
‚Ä¢ notes: Schedule notes
‚Ä¢ status: Schedule status
‚Ä¢ created_at: Creation timestamp

Update an existing interview schedule

üìù **Updatable Fields**:
‚Ä¢ meeting_link: Meeting URL
‚Ä¢ notes: Schedule notes
‚Ä¢ status: Schedule status

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation**:
‚Ä¢ Cannot update if interview is in progress
‚Ä¢ Meeting link must be valid URL

Delete an interview schedule

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation**:
‚Ä¢ Cannot delete if interview is in progress
‚Ä¢ Only schedule owner or admin can delete

Confirm an interview schedule

‚úÖ **Response**:
‚Ä¢ success: Confirmation status
‚Ä¢ email_sent: Email notification status
‚Ä¢ meeting_link: Final meeting URL

üìß **Notifications**:
‚Ä¢ Sends confirmation email to candidate
‚Ä¢ Updates interview status to 'scheduled'

Retrieve all AI interview configurations

ü§ñ **Response**:
‚Ä¢ List of AI interview patterns and settings
‚Ä¢ Configuration templates for different interview types
‚Ä¢ Difficulty levels and question patterns

üîç **Filtering**:
‚Ä¢ interview_type: Filter by interview type
‚Ä¢ difficulty_level: Filter by difficulty

Create a new AI interview configuration

üìã **Required Fields**:
‚Ä¢ name: Configuration name
‚Ä¢ interview_type: Interview type
‚Ä¢ difficulty_level: Difficulty level
‚Ä¢ question_pattern: Question distribution
‚Ä¢ time_allocation: Time settings
‚Ä¢ scoring_criteria: Scoring weights

ü§ñ **Configuration Types**:
‚Ä¢ technical: Technical skills assessment
‚Ä¢ behavioral: Behavioral and soft skills
‚Ä¢ coding: Programming and problem-solving
‚Ä¢ system_design: System architecture
‚Ä¢ case_study: Business case analysis

Get detailed information about a specific AI configuration

üìã **Response Fields**:
‚Ä¢ id: Configuration ID
‚Ä¢ name: Configuration name
‚Ä¢ interview_type: Interview type
‚Ä¢ difficulty_level: Difficulty level
‚Ä¢ question_pattern: Question distribution
‚Ä¢ time_allocation: Time settings
‚Ä¢ scoring_criteria: Scoring weights
‚Ä¢ created_at: Creation timestamp

Update an existing AI interview configuration

üìù **Updatable Fields**:
‚Ä¢ name: Configuration name
‚Ä¢ difficulty_level: Difficulty level
‚Ä¢ question_pattern: Question distribution
‚Ä¢ time_allocation: Time settings
‚Ä¢ scoring_criteria: Scoring weights

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation**:
‚Ä¢ Cannot update if configuration is in use
‚Ä¢ Question pattern percentages must sum to 100

Delete an AI interview configuration

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation**:
‚Ä¢ Cannot delete if configuration is in use
‚Ä¢ Admin users can delete any configuration
‚Ä¢ Non-admin users can only delete their own configurations

Retrieve all interview conflicts

‚ö†Ô∏è **Response**:
‚Ä¢ List of scheduling conflicts
‚Ä¢ Conflict details and resolution status
‚Ä¢ Affected interviews and slots

üîç **Filtering**:
‚Ä¢ conflict_type: Filter by conflict type
‚Ä¢ status: Filter by resolution status
‚Ä¢ date: Filter by conflict date

body.raw:
{
    "conflict_type": "double_booking",
    "description": "Candidate has overlapping interviews",
    "affected_interviews": ["{{interview_id}}"],
    "affected_slots": ["{{slot_id}}"],
    "resolution_notes": "Reschedule one of the interviews"
}

request.description:
Create a new interview conflict record

üìã **Required Fields**:
‚Ä¢ conflict_type: Type of conflict
‚Ä¢ description: Conflict description

üìù **Optional Fields**:
‚Ä¢ affected_interviews: Array of interview IDs
‚Ä¢ affected_slots: Array of slot IDs
‚Ä¢ resolution_notes: Resolution instructions

‚ö†Ô∏è **Conflict Types**:
‚Ä¢ double_booking: Multiple interviews for same candidate
‚Ä¢ slot_unavailable: Slot no longer available
‚Ä¢ ai_system_error: AI system issues
‚Ä¢ time_conflict: Time overlap issues

Get detailed information about a specific conflict

üìã **Response Fields**:
‚Ä¢ id: Conflict UUID
‚Ä¢ conflict_type: Type of conflict
‚Ä¢ description: Conflict description
‚Ä¢ affected_interviews: Affected interview IDs
‚Ä¢ affected_slots: Affected slot IDs
‚Ä¢ resolution_notes: Resolution instructions
‚Ä¢ status: Resolution status
‚Ä¢ created_at: Creation timestamp

Update an existing interview conflict

üìù **Updatable Fields**:
‚Ä¢ status: Resolution status
‚Ä¢ resolution_notes: Resolution instructions
‚Ä¢ description: Conflict description

‚ö†Ô∏è **Status Values**:
‚Ä¢ pending: Conflict pending resolution
‚Ä¢ resolved: Conflict resolved
‚Ä¢ escalated: Conflict escalated to admin

Delete an interview conflict record

‚ö†Ô∏è **Validation**:
‚Ä¢ Only resolved conflicts can be deleted
‚Ä¢ Admin users can delete any conflict
‚Ä¢ Non-admin users can only delete their own conflicts

item.description: AI Interview Slot Management System - Complete slot scheduling, booking, and management for AI-driven interviews

request.description:
Retrieve all evaluations with data isolation

üìä **Data Isolation**:
‚Ä¢ Admin: Sees all evaluations
‚Ä¢ Non-Admin: Sees only evaluations for their candidates

‚úÖ **Response**: List of evaluations with scores, traits, and suggestions

Create a new evaluation for a completed interview

‚úÖ **Validation Rules**:
‚Ä¢ Overall score must be between 0-10
‚Ä¢ Interview must be in 'completed' status
‚Ä¢ Only one evaluation per interview

üìã **Required Fields**:
‚Ä¢ interview: Interview UUID
‚Ä¢ overall_score: Float (0-10)

üìù **Optional Fields**:
‚Ä¢ traits: Text description of candidate traits
‚Ä¢ suggestions: Text suggestions for improvement
Get detailed information about a specific evaluation

Update an existing evaluation

‚úÖ **Validation**: Same rules as creation
‚Ä¢ Overall score must be between 0-10
‚Ä¢ Interview must be in 'completed' status

üìù **Fields**: All fields can be updated
Delete an evaluation permanently
Get evaluation summary for a specific interview (Legacy endpoint)
Get detailed evaluation report for a specific interview (Legacy endpoint)

Submit manual feedback for an interview

üìù **Required Fields**:
‚Ä¢ interview: Interview UUID
‚Ä¢ reviewer: Reviewer name
‚Ä¢ feedback_text: Detailed feedback comments
Get all feedbacks submitted for a specific candidate
Get comprehensive dashboard data and analytics
Get user activity data
Get system performance metrics
Get dashboard summary statistics
Get resume processing statistics
Get interview statistics
Get candidate statistics
Get job posting statistics
Get recent user activities
Export dashboard data for reporting

Retrieve all companies (including inactive ones) in DESC order

‚úÖ **Features**:
‚Ä¢ Shows both active and inactive companies
‚Ä¢ Ordered by newest first (ID descending)
‚Ä¢ Company users see only their own company
‚Ä¢ Admin users see all companies

üìß **Email Support**: Company email field is now included in responses

üìã **Access Control**:
‚Ä¢ Admin: Sees all companies
‚Ä¢ Company User: Sees only their own company
‚Ä¢ Other Users: Limited access

Create a new company with email and password support

üìß **Email Support**: Company email field for contact information
üîë **Password Support**: Company password field (write-only)

üìã **Required Fields**:
‚Ä¢ name, description

üìã **Optional Fields**:
‚Ä¢ email (string): Company contact email
‚Ä¢ password (string): Company password (write-only)
‚Ä¢ is_active (boolean): Company status

‚úÖ **Security**: Password field is never returned in responses
Get detailed information about a specific company
Update company information
Delete a company (soft delete - sets is_active to False)

Retrieve all hiring agencies (including inactive ones) in DESC order

‚úÖ **Features**:
‚Ä¢ Shows both active and inactive hiring agencies
‚Ä¢ Ordered by newest first (ID descending)
‚Ä¢ Company users see only their hiring agencies
‚Ä¢ Admin users see all hiring agencies

üîí **Role Filtering**: This API now returns ONLY hiring agencies (role='Hiring Agency'), not other user roles.

üìã **Access Control**:
‚Ä¢ Admin: Sees all hiring agencies from all companies
‚Ä¢ Company User: Sees only hiring agencies from their own company
‚Ä¢ Other Users: Empty list (no access)

‚úÖ **Security**: Prevents data leakage of other user roles (Recruiter, Company, etc.)

Create a new hiring agency user (Admin/Company only)

üîë **Password Support**: The API now supports password field for hiring agency creation.

üè¢ **Company Relationship**:
‚Ä¢ Company users: Auto-assigns to their company
‚Ä¢ Admin users: Can provide input_company_name to link to existing company

üìã **Required Fields**:
‚Ä¢ email, role, first_name, last_name, phone_number
‚Ä¢ password (optional)
‚Ä¢ input_company_name (optional, for admin users to resolve company)

‚úÖ **Role Validation**: Only accepts 'Hiring Agency' role

‚ö†Ô∏è **Note**: Use this endpoint (/add_user/) instead of the root endpoint for creation
